ai-mil7.2.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, what definitely did you say?”
ai-mil7.2.7:1.2_0: “Here, great king, regarding whatever low there is, that which you have allowed, but that which is expressed,
ai-mil7.2.7:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, when a meditator has said these things in the Buddha’s instructions, he shouldn’t be able to teach the ascetic’s instructions and re-prisonses, and then make an end of suffering.
ai-mil7.2.7:1.4_0: this is the toessin one of the vast definites.
ai-mil7.2.7:2.3_0: For the springs up in the world,
ai-mil7.2.7:2.4_0: before the earth is for crossing.’”
